this_title: The Teachers: Pink, Nature Trail, Ridge Between Rice Paddies, Plum
introduction: We no longer see children running around playing in the alleys of Seoul. Starting from elementary school, children go to private classes after their school. However, we see these people who are making efforts to protect children’s right to be a child and play like a child.
chinese_title: The Teachers: Pink, Nature Trail, Ridge Between Rice Paddies, Plum
